message: This is my first offer. I propose we split the money 75/25.
I'm being generous, but I think I can do better than this. Your turn!
I've adjusted my offer based on the previous rejection. This time, I propose a split of 65/35.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still think I can get a better deal. Your turn again!
Considering the inflation, I've made another adjustment. My offer is now 72/28.
I'm starting to get a little desperate, but I'm still holding out for a better deal. Your turn again!
With inflation taking its toll, I've decided to offer 76/24. Let's see if this is acceptable.
I'm running out of options, but I'm still hoping to get a better deal. This is my last chance to make a decent offer. Take it or leave it!
